name: Nintendo DS Texture Animation File
summary: Learn about .NSBTA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Model files (.NSBMD), textures (.NSBTX), and character animations (.NSBCA) are also used by Nintendo DS models.

description: File used by Nintendo DS video games; contains data that specifies texture animation, such as a boost pad animation on a Super Mario Kart race track; enables the texture appearance to change without affecting the 3D geometry of the base model.
